ValueSet-ICVPVaccineType.description: JSON Schema for Vaccine Types for use in the ICVP ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-ICVPVaccineType.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the Vaccine Types for use in the ICVP ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/icvp/ValueSet-ICVPVaccineType.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
